articles.title: Art Performance Given by Art Squads of Mills
articles.content:
Art Performance Given by Art Squads of Mills 
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The members of the art squad of the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill and the itinerant art squad of the Pyongyang Textile Mill gave an art performance at the Mansudae Art Theatre on July 21.
					 It was enjoyed by senior Party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the ministries and national institutions, creators, artistes and pressmen in the fields of culture and the arts and media.
					
					 The performers put on the stage colorful numbers such as choruses "The General Is Our Father" and "Song of a Front-Ranker in the Chollima Movement", poem and chorus "Song of Best Wishes", the immortal classic masterpiece, dialogic poem "We Sing of the Loving Care Shown by the Three Commanders of Mt. Paektu", female chorus "Oriole Chirps in Compound of Our Mill" and witty talk "Being Churned out in Endless Stream".
					
					 They truthfully represented the working people making leap forward and innovations in the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance.

articles.title: Phibada Opera Troupe Returns
articles.content:
Phibada Opera Troupe Returns
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The Phibada Opera Troupe of the DPRK came back home Wednesday after wrapping up its performance tour of China with opera "A Dream of Red Mansions".
					 They were greeted at Pyongyang Railway Station by Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, An Tong Chun, minister of Culture, Kim Pyong Hun, chairman of the C.C., the General Federation of the Unions of Art and Literature of Korea, officials concerned, creators, artistesï¼Œ teachers and students in the field of art and culture and Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy.

articles.title: Pyongyangites Supplied with Early Peaches
articles.content:
Pyongyangites Supplied with Early Peaches
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- Early peaches picked in Kwail County of South Hwanghae Province are being supplied to nursery and kindergarten children and Pyongyangites through commercial and service networks.
					  A large unit of trucks loaded with peaches arrived here on July 20.
					
					 Early peaches are being also transported by train.

articles.title: Exhibition of Ri Dynasty Furniture Goes On
articles.content:
Exhibition of Ri Dynasty Furniture Goes On
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- An exhibition of furniture belonging to the Ri Dynasty is going on at the Korean Folklore Museum from July 1.
					 On display at the exhibition are typical furniture such as chest, coffer, wardrobe, drawers and study fixtures and small dining table.
					
					 Attracting eyes of the visitors are mother-of-pearl box for ceremonial dress, casket, picnic box, lacquered mother-of-pearl wardrobe, clothes chest with a hinged front flap, strongbox, cupboard, desk and small dining table patterned with lotus leaves.
					
					 The 200-odd-year-old clothes chest has three drawers, the top for men's dresses, the middle for women's and the lower for children's. The front part of the chest was patterned with animals and plants.
					
					 The exhibits show well the skill and talent of the Korean people. 
					
					 The exhibition continues until October.

articles.title: Model of Contemporary Siege Warfare
articles.content:
Model of Contemporary Siege Warfare
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The operation for liberating Taejon during the Fatherland Liberation War (June 25, 1950 - July 27, 1953) is still considered a model of contemporary siege warfare. In the operation units of the heroic Korean People's Army (KPA) annihilated the 24th Division of the U.S. Army, which had boasted of being "ever-victorious".
					 A military academy in Europe chose excellent and perfect town-siege battles in the contemporary history of war. Among them the Taejon liberation operation led by President Kim Il Sung was selected as the best one. 
					
					 At that time Taejon, the seat of South Chungchong Province, was a strategic point which the south Korean puppet authorities set as the temporary capital and stationed ruling organs.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists, in an attempt to reverse the situation turning to their disadvantage due to the KPA's continuous strikes, brought more aggression forces to Korea and, at the same time, tried to arrest the advance of the KPA units by availing themselves of the town favorable for defence. 
					
					 The President made a KPA unit move more than 40 kilometers overnight from Ronsan southwest of Taejon towards an area southeast of the town to encircle the division and keep it from retreating or taking reinforcements. He then dispatched a small unit to downtown to confuse the enemy, while keeping all the units participating in the operation ready to strike the enemy in front and sides.
					
					 The combined units of the KPA started an all-out attack early on the morning of July 20, Juche 39 (1950) and totally liberated Taejon after seven hours. Dean, commander of the division, was captured in the battle.
					
					 A U.S. army officer who took part in the Korean War confessed in his article that any U.S. army officers had no understanding of the tactics the President applied to the Taejon liberation operation until it was too late for them.
					
					 Indeed, the victory in the operation was the fruition of his war methods and tactics of the Korean style.

articles.title: NRC Accuses Lee Myung Bak of Its Suppression of Progressive Forces
articles.content:
NRC Accuses Lee Myung Bak of Its Suppression of Progressive Forces
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors recently committed such fascist actions as conducting a surprise search operation against offices of the Solidarity for Progress of south Korea, the Pusan Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, the Korean National Council for the Promotion of the Reunification by Federal Formula and other reunification movement organizations and houses of those key figures concerned and arresting, walking off and investigating their leading members on charges of violating the "Security Law".
					 It also suppressed the Citizens' Solidarity for Democratic Society for sending to the United Nations Security Council a letter calling for impartial and objective discussions on the "results of the investigation" into the case of sunk warship of the puppet authorities after branding it as an "enemy-benefiting organization." It is, at the same time, resorting to a dastardly investigation into main figures of the former regime on absurd charges.
					
					 A spokesman for the National Reconciliation Council in a statement issued on Wednesday termed the above-said actions last-ditch efforts of the group of traitors to prevent the spirit of supporting the inter-Korean joint declaration from running high, stem the trend of the times toward national reconciliation and unity, stamp out the progressive forces including the reunification movement organizations in south Korea and get rid of the serious ruling crisis.
					
					 The statement went on: 
					
					 It is natural for the fellow countrymen in the north and the south to meet and talk to each other and for the south Korean people to call for justice, democracy, independence and reunification. This does not pose any problem.
					
					 The frantic crackdown on the progressive democratic forces including the reunification movement organizations conducted by the puppet group would only fully reveal its ugly colors as a strangler of democracy and enemy of reunification.
					
					  The puppet group is sadly mistaken if it calculates it can prop up its dictatorial regime and quell the people's desire for national reconciliation and reunification through fascist suppression.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group should stop at once its suppression of the progressive democratic forces and guarantee them free activities.

articles.title: US Reckless Moves for Modernization of Military Hardware under Fire
articles.content:
US Reckless Moves for Modernization of Military Hardware under Fire
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The U.S. bellicose forces are now putting spurs to the development of a flying submarine and a micro-flying object to be used for street fighting. The U.S. imperialists are the warmaniacs to be condemned by all people as they abuse latest scientific and technological achievements for the modernization of war hardware though they should be used for the development of human civilization. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes this in a signed commentary. 
					
					 It goes on: 
					
					 The U.S. talks a lot about "peace" and "disarmament" whenever a chance presents itself, but this is nothing but a clumsy window dressing to cover up their true colors as the arch criminal disturbing world peace and security and escalating the arms race.
					
					 It is an invariable strategic goal and wild ambition of the U.S. to dominate the world by force of arms.
					
					 The U.S. remains unchanged in this wild ambition despite the passage of times and replacement of generations.
					
					 The present U.S. administration pretends to be "interested" in the global peace and security, talking about "changes" and "multilateral cooperative diplomacy." However, its true colors as a war maniac is being brought to bolder relief as the days go by.
					
					 Arms buildup and modernization of war hardware are incompatible with world peace and security.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists' reckless moves for the modernization of war hardware are anti-peace ones as they are fanning up worldwide arms race and military confrontation and straining the international situation. 
					
					 With no rhetoric can the U.S. cover up its true colors as the arch criminal disturbing global peace and security and sparking off a new international arms race.
					
					 History will certainly mete out a stern punishment to the U.S. imperialists for their criminal acts one day.

articles.title: US Urged to Drop Its Daydream to Dominate World
articles.content:
US Urged to Drop Its Daydream to Dominate World 
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- Of late the U.S. Department of Defense formally announced that the U.S.-south Korea joint military maneuvers would be kicked off soon. These maneuvers are, to all intents and purposes, dangerous saber-rattling aimed at rounding off their preparations for joint military actions, pursuant to their scenario for a war of aggression against the DPRK and mounting a surprise preemptive attack on it. 
					 Minju Joson Wednesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. is contemplating staging a joint anti-submarine drill under the pretext of coping with the "intrusion" of DPRK's submarines into the waters of the east and west seas of Korea. But lurking behind these moves are a design to invade the DPRK to put the whole of Korea under its control and a more important aim to establish military hegemony in Northeast Asia and pressurize and contain other big powers by force of arms in this region. 
					
					 As Northeast Asia including the Korean Peninsula is of great military and strategic importance, the U.S. considers the peninsula, a gateway to the region, as its vantage point for carrying out its strategy of Asian aggression.
					
					 Cold War came to an end but the U.S. ambition to dominate the world remains unchanged. Its moves for a war of aggression have become evermore pronounced to carry out the strategy to put Asia and the Pacific under its control.
					
					 Asian countries will never remain an onlooker to the U.S. moves to hold military hegemony.
					
					 If enemies dare provoke a war, the army and people of the DPRK who have bolstered up the war deterrent in every way will wage an all-out struggle and demonstrate the mettle of Songun Korea.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to give up its foolish dream to control other countries and dominate the world by dint of its strong-arm military policy.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on S. Korean Serious Ruling Crisis
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on S. Korean Serious Ruling Crisis
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean ruling quarters find themselves in a serious ruling crisis in the run-up to "by-election to the National Assembly." This is a natural product of their unpopular policies.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The present ruling crisis is mainly attributable to the south Korean conservative authorities' policy of depending on foreign forces.
					
					 The present south Korean regime is a died-in-the-wool pro-U.S. sycophantic regime. No sooner had the conservative group come to power than adopted the "strengthening of alliance" with the U.S. as its "top priority task," a clear indication of its policy of depending on foreign forces.
					
					 Not only the present south Korean chief executive but those assisting him in his diplomatic and security policies are hell-bent on sycophancy towards the U.S. without exception.
					
					 By postponing the "transfer of wartime operational control" the south Korean conservative group self-exposed that it is the group of lackeys and diehard puppet gangsters of the U.S.
					
					 Their moves to internationalize the "Cheonan" case brought to light the treacherous and sycophantic nature of the policy of depending on foreign forces pursued by the south Korean ruling quarters.
					
					 Their reckless policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen going against the trend of the era touched off grudge and wrath among the people.
					
					 The conservative group scuttled all dialogues and cooperation undertakings which had been brisk since the adoption of the June 15 joint declaration, raising the "settlement of the nuclear issue" as a precondition for improving the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 As soon as the sunk warship case occurred, it groundlessly asserted that it was sunk by "a torpedo attack by the north", declaring a total collapse of the inter-Korean relations and frantically escalating the military confrontation and the rackets for a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 The people's resentment at the present conservative authorities has reached its unbearable extent as they are more desperately pursuing unpopular policies, hell-bent on depending on foreign forces and escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen.

articles.title: S. Korea Accused of Its Moves to Intensify Anti-DPRK Campaign
articles.content:
S. Korea Accused of Its Moves to Intensify Anti-DPRK Campaign
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities were recently reported to have held the first "diplomatic and security policy coordination meeting" since the adoption of the presidential statement at the UNSC. At this meeting attended by the ministers of "Foreign Affairs and Trade," "Unification" and "National Defense," and chief diplomatic and security secretaries of "Chongwadae" and others they had an in-depth discussion on putting into practice such "measures against the north" as the joint naval maneuvers with the U.S. they planned to stage over the warship "Cheonan" case, the "escalation of the psychological warfare against the north" and "suspension of the south-north cooperation."
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard: 
					
					 The above-said development indicates that the conservative group has not given up its "psychological warfare against the north" but hatched a plot to continue using it as a lever of pressure upon the DPRK. This, at the same time, patently proves that the conservative authorities remain unchanged in their one-sided policy of confrontation even after the publication of the above-said presidential statement. 
					
					 A scrutiny into the participants in the meeting shows that they were diehard confrontation maniacs who have taken the lead in fostering distrust and confrontation among fellow countrymen and bringing the north-south relations to a collapse.
					
					 After experiencing a hot agony of shame under the eyes of the world with its international campaign to tighten sanctions against the DPRK proving futile, this group is now making desperate efforts to recover from its total fiasco at the UN at any cost, save its face and inject energy into its bankrupt confrontational racket.
					
					 The conservative group had better draw a lesson from all what it has done so far over the warship case and bear deep in mind that it can never find a way out of the present dilemma in escalating the confrontation between the north and the south.

articles.title: Plan for South Korea-US Joint Naval Maneuvers Announced
articles.content:
Plan for South Korea-US Joint Naval Maneuvers Announced
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The puppet Ministry of National Defence on July 20 announced that the south Korea-U.S. joint naval maneuvers would be staged in the East Sea of Korea, according to a report of south Korean MBC.
					 To be involved in the above-said maneuvers to take place between July 25 and 28 are at least 8 000 troops of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces and south Korean puppet army, nuclear-powered carrier "George Washington" belonging to the U.S. 7th fleet, over 20 warships including submarines and more than 200 aircraft including a formation of "F-22A Raptor".
					
					 The puppet warmongers declared that the projected military maneuvers, the largest in the history of the naval military exercises, are aimed to tighten the "alliance" for invading the DPRK and they would go on in waters of the East and West Seas of Korea in the future. 
					
					 This is nothing but foolish desperate efforts of the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak puppet group to divert elsewhere the international attention and tide over their crisis through their moves for a war of aggression against the DPRK after coming under worldwide fire for faking up the case of warship "Cheonan."

articles.title: US Nuclear-Powered Carrier Flotilla Enters Pusan Port
articles.content:
US Nuclear-Powered Carrier Flotilla Enters Pusan Port
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The nuclear-powered carrier "George Washington" belonging to the U.S. 7th Fleet entered Pusan Port on July 21, according to a report of the south Korean "Yonhap News". 
					 Aegis destroyers belonging to the carrier flotilla also entered the naval military base in Pusan. 
					
					 This flotilla is expected to participate together with the south Korean puppet army in the joint military exercises to be staged in waters of the East Sea of Korea from July 25 to 28.

articles.title: Internet Homepage of Pomchonghakryon Shut down in S. Korea
articles.content:
Internet Homepage of Pomchonghakryon Shut down in S. Korea
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The puppet police of south Korea closed the Internet homepage of the South Headquarters of Pan-national Alliance of Youth and Students for Korea's Reunification (Pomchonghakryon), according to a report of south Korean Yonhap News on July 19. 
					 The puppet police authorities have conducted a wholesale investigation into the homepage of the above-said headquarters since the end of last year. Claiming that most of the articles posted on its Internet site praised the DPRK, they have persistently pressurized it to delete those articles. Some days ago, they ordered the puppet broadcasting and news service committee to issue a decision on shutting down the homepage. 
					
					 Moreover, they threatened to apply "sanctions" against all homepages in case articles praising the DPRK are found out in the course of investigation. 
					
					 The repressive actions taken by the fascist police betray its sinister intention to quell the desire for achieving reunification through alliance with the DPRK growing stronger among the south Korean people and crack down upon the activities of the reunification movement organizations.

articles.title: Meeting of Officials of Chongryon Held
articles.content:
Meeting of Officials of Chongryon Held 
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- A meeting of chairmen of the headquarters under the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and heads of central organizations and enterprises took place at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on July 16 to thoroughly implement the decision of the 22nd Congress of Chongryon.
					 Present at the meeting were Chief Vice-Chairman Ho Jong Man, Vice-Chairman Nam Sung U and others and department directors of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, chairmen of its different local Chongryon headquarters in Japan and leading officials of main central organizations and enterprises.
					
					 Ho Jong Man in his report proposed goals and tasks to be honored to consolidate the organizations of Chongryon, keeping pace with the dynamic drive of the people in the homeland all out to greet the historic conference of the Workers' Party of Korea and the significant 65th anniversary of the WPK with high political enthusiasm and shining labor achievements.
					
					 He called for dynamically waging a diverse mass innovation movement to achieve shining results in the efforts to intensify national education, the work with young Koreans, the "movement to invite Koreans to come to the fold of Chongryon" and the movement to gain rights and thus implement the patriotic tasks for this year without fail till October when the 65th anniversary of the WPK will be celebrated. 
					
					 Speeches were made there by chairmen of different local headquarters of Chongryon such as those in Tokyo, Kyoto, Osaka, Hyogo, Saitama and Hiroshima prefectures, the chairperson of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, the chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan and the managing director of the Korean Federation of Workers in Commerce in Japan.

articles.title: Solidarity with Korean People's Struggle Called for in Pakistan
articles.content:
Solidarity with Korean People's Struggle Called for in Pakistan
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The Pakistan Organization for Afro-Asian People's Solidarity, the Pakistan Trade Union Federation, the Pakistan Peasants Committee, the Pakistan Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification and the Lahore Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association issued a joint statement on July 14 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 The Korean War that broke out on June 25, 1950 was, obviously, a product of the deliberate and premeditated scenario of the U.S. imperialists for aggression, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The heroic Korean people inflicted an ignominious defeat upon the U.S. imperialists and their allies under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists suffered a defeat in Korea, the first of its kind in their history of war, knelt down to the Korean people and signed the Armistice Agreement on July 27, 1953.
					
					 They are still posing a threat and putting pressure upon the DPRK instead of replacing the Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty. 
					
					 This is arousing great concern among the peace-loving people of the world.
					
					 We hope that the Korean people will achieve great success in their efforts to implement the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration under the leadership of Kim Jong Il and fully support the measures taken by the DPRK government for national reunification.
					
					 We call upon the peace-loving people of the world to express solidarity with the Korean people in their struggle to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked in Mexico
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked in Mexico
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea issued the 59th issue of bulletin on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Giving Priority to Ideological Work Is Essential for Accomplishing Socialism".
					 The bulletin carried an article titled "Giving priority to ideological work" with the photo of the Tower of the Juche Idea.
					
					 The bulletin in the article said that the work expounds the original idea that definite priority should be given to ideological work among other things with main emphasis put on the idea in accomplishing socialism based on the deep analysis of the law governing the establishment of the socialist system and its consolidation and development and the essential characteristics of the socialist society.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il has regarded it as an immutable principle to develop the party and the army by dint of the idea and achieve the prosperity of the country and the nation by ideologically awakening the people. 
					
					 Socialism of Korea has demonstrated its might as an invincible bulwark that remains unfazed by the imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK. This clearly testifies to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il who has consistently laid main emphasis on the idea.
					
					 His work serves as important guidelines that should be cherished not only by the Korean people but also the parties and the peoples of all countries aspiring after socialism.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Commemorated
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Commemorated
Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- A lecture was held in Thailand on July 15 on the occasion of the 13th anniversary of the publication of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification".
					 Songchit Pullarp, chairman of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand, said in the lecture that the three charters for national reunification which reflect the idea of "By our nation itself" and the idea of independence are the most reasonable and fair and aboveboard great programme for reunification as they are in line with the actual conditions of Korea where differing ideologies and systems exist in the north and the south and the Korean people's unanimous desire for reunification.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed immortal feats in the history of the Korean reunification movement, he said, and went on:
					
					 The President put forward the three principles of national reunification--independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity--the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo and Kim Jong Il formulated them as the three charters for national reunification, leading all Koreans to hold fast to them in the reunification movement.
					
					 We hope that the Korean people will achieve the country's reunification as early as possible under the banner of the three charters for national reunification.

articles.title: CRN condena la represion fascista contra movimiento de reunificacion
articles.content:
CRN condena la represion fascista contra movimiento de reunificacion
Pyongyang, 21 de julio (ATCC) -- En estos dias, la banda de traidores surcoreanos perpetro un acto fascista de registrar de manera sorpresiva, en virtud de la "ley de seguridad", las oficinas y viviendas de los miembros medulares de la "Solidaridad por el Progreso del Sur de Corea", la direccion en Pusan del Comite Sureno para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, el "Consejo por la Promocion de la Reunificacion de Nuestra Nacion segun el Sistema Federal" y otras entidades del movimiento por la reunificacion. Luego, ella arresto y sometio al interrogatorio a los miembros principales de estas entidades.
					   Por otra parte, reprimio la "Solidaridad de Ciudadanos por la Sociedad Democratica", que envio al Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU un mensaje demandando la verificacion imparcial y objetiva del "resultado de investigacion" del caso de hundimiento del buque de guerra publicado por las autoridades surcoreanas, calificandola de "organizacion proenemiga".
					
					  Comete tambien la bajeza de abrir la investigacion sobre las figuras importantes del anterior "regimen" bajo injustas sospechas.
					
					  Esto deviene el ultimo esfuerzo de esa camarilla por liberarse de la profunda crisis de gobernacion al detener el cada dia mas creciente apoyo a la Declaracion Conjunta y la corriente de la epoca hacia la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion y al eliminar las entidades del movimiento de reunificacion y otras fuerzas progresistas del Sur de Corea.
					
					  Asi senalo el vocero del Consejo de Reconciliacion Nacional (CRN) en su declaracion fechada 21 y continuo:
					
					  No hay nada que cuestionar y es natural que los coreanos del Norte y el Sur se reunan para dialogar y los habitantes surcoreanos demanden la justicia, la democracia, la independencia y la reunificacion.
					
					  Cuanto mas la banda traidora recurra a la campana de represion contra las entidades del movimiento de reunificacion y otras fuerzas progresistas y democraticas, tanto mas claramente se revelara su naturaleza de sofocador de la democracia y enemigo de la reunificacion.
					
					Estaria muy equivocada si ella piensa que podria mantener con la represion fascista su "poder" dictatorial y frustrar el deseo de los surcoreanos de la reconciliacion nacional y la reunificacion.
					
					  La banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak debe parar ahora mismo la represion contra las fuerzas progresistas y democraticas y asegurar las actividades libres de ellas.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia  modernizacion de medios belico
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia  modernizacion de medios belicos
Pyongyang, 21 de julio (ATCC) -- Ultimamente, los belicistas norteamericanos dan acicate al desarrollo del "submarino volador" y el mini-objeto volante para el combate en las calles. Merecen la condena y las maldiciones de todo el mundo esos maniacos de guerra que malemplean en la modernizacion de los equipos belicos los exitos cientifico-tecnicos de punta que deben contribuir al desarrollo de civilizacion humana.
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este miercoles y continua:
					
					Si bien EE.UU. habla a menudo de la "paz" y el "desarme", estas palabras no pasan de ser una torpe artimana para ocultar su naturaleza criminal de destructor de la paz y la seguridad del mundo y promotor principal de la carrera armamentista.
					
					La dominacion del mundo con las fuerzas armadas es invariable proposito estrategico y ambicion de EE.UU.
					
					Aunque se sucedieron siglos y administraciones, esta ambicion sigue siendo invariable.
					
					La actual administracion norteamericana habla mucho del "cambio" y la "diplomacia de cooperacion multilateral" como si estuviera "interesada" en la paz y la seguridad del mundo. Pero, la naturaleza criminal de los maniacos de guerra norteamericanos se revela cada vez mas claramente con el paso del tiempo.
					
					La paz y la seguridad del mundo son incompatibles con el aumento de las fuerzas armadas y la modernizacion de los equipos belicos.
					
					La imprudente modernizacion de los equipos belicos de EE.UU. es el acto anti-paz que incita la carrera armamentista y la confrontacion militar a escala mundial y agrava la situacion internacional.
					
					La historia enjuiciara severamente tarde o temprano los actos criminales de EE.UU.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia complot anti-RPDC de titeres surcoreanos
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia complot anti-RPDC de titeres surcoreanos 
Pyongyang, 21 de julio (ATCC) -- Hace poco, las autoridades surcoreanas celebraron la "reunion de coordinacion de la politica diplomatica y de seguridad" por primera vez despues de la aprobacion de la declaracion del presidente del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU sobre el incidente de hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan".
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los ministros de "Relaciones Exteriores y de Comercio", de "Reunificacion" y de "Defensa Nacional", el jefe de seguridad y de diplomacia de "Chongwadae", etc., quienes discutieron intensamente los proyectos de ejecucion de los ejercicios maritimos combinados, que habian planeado con Estados Unidos bajo el pretexto del incidente del "Cheonan", y las "medidas contra el Norte" como la "intensificacion de la campana psicologica anti-RPDC" y el "cese de la cooperacion Sur-Norte".
					
					Este hecho muestra que la banda de conservadores surcoreanos no ha renunciado la "campana psicologica anti-RPDC", sino trazo el complot de seguir utilizandola como medio de presion anti-RPDC. Ademas, comprueba que la politica conflictiva de las autoridades conservadoras surcoreanas sigue invariable aun despues de la publicacion de la declaracion del presidente del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU. 
					
					  Senala asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este miercoles y prosigue:
					
					Todos los participantes en aquella reunion son maniacos de enfrentamiento que maniobraron mas activamente que nadie para agravar la desconfianza y la discordia entre los connacionales y acabar con las relaciones intercoreanas. 
					
					  Puesto que ha pasado tremenda pena a la vista de todo el mundo al verse fracasado su intento de sancionar a la RPDC en la arena internacional, la banda de conservadores surcoreanos se desespera por reparar su derrota en la ONU y rescatar su honra dando alientos a la ya inefectiva campana conflictiva e intrigante contra la RPDC.
					
					  Ellos deben aprender la leccion de sus vanas contramedidas tomadas hasta ahora en cuanto al incidente del "Cheonan" y darse clara cuenta de que la confrontacion entre ambas partes coreanas no es la salida de la crisis actual.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena el ejercicio militar conjunto EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena el ejercicio militar conjunto EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 21 de julio (ATCC) -- Recientemente, el Departamento de Defensa de Estados Unidos publico oficialmente que realizaria pronto el ejercicio militar conjunto con el Sur de Corea. 
					Esto deviene el peligroso alboroto belico para dar ataque preventivo y sorpresivo contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea tras completar la coordinacion de las acciones militares de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea frente a la eventual guerra de agresion a la RPDC.
					
					  Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual del dia 21 y continua:
					
					  EE.UU. trata de desarrollar el ejercicio conjunto antisubmarinos bajo el pretexto de bloquear la "penetracion" de los submarinos de la RPDC en los Mares Este y Oeste de Corea.
					
					  Pero, en realidad persigue tomar en su mano toda Corea invadiendo a la RPDC y, en particular, establecer la hegemonia militar en el Nordeste Asiatico y presionar y mantener a raya en sentido militar a otras potencias de la region.
					
					  La Peninsula Coreana y el resto de la region del Nordeste Asiatico ocupan una posicion muy importante en lo militar y estrategico.
					
					  Por lo tanto, EE.UU. toma la Peninsula Coreana, corredor de esa region, como su nido importante en el cumplimiento de su agresiva estrategia sobre Asia.
					
					  Aunque se puso fin a la guerra fria, es invariable la ambicion de EE.UU. de tomar la heguemonia mundial y se tornan cada dia mas abiertas sus maniobras belicistas para realizar la estrategia de dominar a Asia y el Pacifico.
					
					  Los paises asiaticos no estaran jamas con brazos cruzados ante tal comportamiento de EE.UU.
					
					  Si los enemigos se atreven a provocar la guerra, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea, que han venido consolidando por todos los medios el disuasivo de guerra, mostraran sin reservas el temperamento de la Corea del Songun usando todas sus fuerzas.
					
					  EE.UU. debe abandonar su ilusion irrisoria de aplastar a otros paises y dominar el mundo con el autoritarismo militar.

articles.title: Transcurre con exito la exhibicion de muebles de interes historico
articles.content:
Transcurre con exito la exhibicion de muebles de interes historico
Pyongyang, 21 de julio (ATCC) -- El Museo Folclorico de Corea, donde esta montada desde el dia primero la exposicion de muebles-reliquias, es visitado en estos dias por muchos trabajadores de diferentes sectores.
					En la ocasion estan exhibidas muchas reliquias representativas del periodo de la Dinastia de los Ri, tales como, cajas, cofres, guardarropas, armarios, muebles de escritorio y mesitas de comer.
					
					Entre ellas saltan a la vista la caja de incrustacion de ajuar de boda, el escrino, la cantina, la guardarropa de incrustacion decorada, el ropero, el aparador, la mesa pequena en forma de la flor de loto, la mesa, etc.
					
					Sobre todo, despiertan el interes de los visitantes el ropero con estampado de flores, que sirve para colgar las ropas de los hombres, y el armario incrustado de 3 escalones donde se conservan los vestidos de hombres, mujeres y ninos en sus partes superior, central y baja, respectivamente.
					
					Ademas, sobresalen el arca de Pakchon, el cofre de Paekdong y la mesita de Haeju, etc., que tienen el valor de patrimonio nacional por sus usos practicos y finos efectos decorativos.
					
					Esta exposicion, que muestra la inteligencia y talentos del pueblo coreano a traves del mobiliario de la Dinastia de los Ri, se extendera hasta octubre que viene.
